jsx.ui
Class Container.Layout

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.ui.Container.Layout
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsoluteLayout
Enclosing class:
Container
public abstract static class Container.Layout
extends Configurable

A base class that constructs default layout managers.

A layout manager graphically layouts children for a container.

Note, A layout manger is Configurable.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

CONTENT_WIDTH

protected static final Id<java.lang.Double> CONTENT_WIDTH

A global identifier for a configurable property of a Container.Layout object.

The identified configurable property of a Container.Layout object refers to the cached content width of the container the layout is in charge of.

Since:
1.0

CONTENT_HEIGHT

protected static final Id<java.lang.Double> CONTENT_HEIGHT

A global identifier for a configurable property of a Container.Layout object.

The identified configurable property of a Container.Layout object refers to the cached content height of the container the layout is in charge of.

Since:
1.0
Constructor Detail

Container.Layout

protected Container.Layout(ObjectLike ini)

A typical constructor forcing constructors of subclasses to pass initializing data.

This constructor simply invokes the typical constructor of the superclass passing a copy of the specified initializing object, or if the argument one is undefined, a newly created ObjectLike object as the argument.

Parameters:
ini - The initializing object that can also be created with an object literal.
Since:
1.0

Container.Layout

protected Container.Layout()

The default constructor that creates a default layout manager.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of the superclass passing the newly created initializing object as the argument without setting any configurable properties.

Since:
1.0
Method Detail

fix

protected static final int fix(java.lang.Integer i)

Evaluates an integer number and returns 0 if the number is undefined.

Parameters:
i - The integer number to evaluate.
Returns:
The value of the number or 0 if it is undefined.
Since:
1.0

updateContentWidth

protected static final boolean updateContentWidth(Container c)

Updates the cached content width for a container.

Parameters:
c - The container of which to update the cached content width.
Returns:
true if the cached width is updated; false, otherwise.
Since:
1.0

updateContentHeight

protected static final boolean updateContentHeight(Container c)

Updates the cached content height for a container.

Parameters:

Returns:
true if the cached height is updated; false, otherwise.
Since:
1.0

doLayout

protected abstract void doLayout(Container c)

Layouts a container.

This method simply displays all the children of the specified container by appending them to the container in the same sequence as in the children list. A subclass should override this method to provide a particular layout.

Parameters:
c - The container to layout.
Since:
1.0

onResize

protected abstract void onResize(Container c)

Layouts a container when notified it has been resized.

This method does nothing. A subclass should override this method to perform an action if necessary.

Parameters:
c - The container to layout on resizing.
Since:
1.0
